examples.example: 我们都在努力追求属于自己的幸福。

translate.english: We are all striving hard to pursue our own happiness.

examples.example: 生活中处处都有小确幸，只要用心感受就能体会到幸福。

translate.english: There are small blessings everywhere in life, and as long as you feel it with your heart, you can experience happiness.

examples.example: 只要我们保持积极的心态，幸福就会常伴我们左右。

translate.english: As long as we keep a positive attitude, happiness will always be by our side.
